title: How to Back Up Windows XP

steps.title: Click Start -> Run -> type in, without the quotes, "ntbackup.exe".
steps.content: Click Start -> Run -> type in, without the quotes, "ntbackup.exe".

steps.title: Click on Backup Wizard and then "Next".
steps.content: Click on Backup Wizard and then "Next".

steps.title: Select the radio button "Backup everything on this computer" and click "Next".
steps.content: Select the radio button "Backup everything on this computer" and click "Next".

steps.title: Choose a location where you will save your backup.
steps.content: Choose a location where you will save your backup.

steps.title: Type in a name of your backup that you will recognize and click "Next".
steps.content: Type in a name of your backup that you will recognize and click "Next".

steps.title: Click "Finish" and your backup will begin.
steps.content: Click "Finish" and your backup will begin.

steps.title: It will complete and provide you a report of the backup.
steps.content: It will complete and provide you a report of the backup.

steps.title: Click "Close" and your backup is complete.
steps.content: Click "Close" and your backup is complete.
